responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: is the product of good quality?
how do i use the product
what is the warranty of the product?
how do i contact the customer support?
responses: quality is good check the description for further information,check the product description, 1-2 years warranty,customer care number available at the product description.

patterns: what should i do if my order is approved but hasn't shipped yet?
how quickly can i get my order?
my order has reached the nearest delivery hub, why isn't my order out for delivery yet?
responses: incase your order hasn't been shipped in the given time contact customer care,orders will be delivered by the date you see on the product page for your location.

patterns: what are the modes of refund available?
I have still not received the refund in my bank account
why does it take time to refund the amount?
responses: if u have received a mail confirming your refund request it means refund has been initiated you can receive the refund in form of UPI or gift cards or amount will be directly processed to your bank account.
